name: fiona
notes:
fiona is a 10-inch square made with stylecraft special
double knit and a 4mm hook.

designed for the bamcal 2024.

you can follow a 2, 3, 5 or 7 colour scheme, these are
listed in the separate pdf, as well as the yarn amounts
used per round.
the instructions for 1 colour can be found on page 9 of
the pdf.
the colours used for the photo tutorial are white and
pistachio.

i hope you enjoy making it as much as i did.

happy hooking.
